About PeopleSync App

If you have questions regarding this free app, please follow us in Twitter @messageconcept or like us in facebook.com/messageconcept. Support by phone or email is not available. PeopleSync App is an Android 4+ sync adapter for CardDAV. It was built as a client for the messageconcept PeopleSync CardDAV server, but also works with 3rd party servers. Please note: As a business client the app does not allow the selection of individual address books or calendars to synchronize. This selection is made on server side by your systems administrator by setting per-user permissions in the PeopleSync server. If you need to alter individual settings on client side, please switch to one of the 3rd party apps, available in your application store. These are the most important buttons in the app:
Automatically adds PeopleSync accounts for all existing mail accounts on the device. The default server config is set by your systems administrator. This function requires a PeopleSync server.
Adds a new PeopleSync account. You are able to retrieve the default settings for your email address, if you configure a PeopleSync server. Alternatively, you can enter manual settings for account.
Removes the current PeopleSync account settings from your device.
Resets server config to the default settings for your PeopleSync server. The default settings are set by your systems administrator. This function requires a PeopleSync server.
Closes the dialog with saving your changes.
Cancels the dialog and discards your changes.
If you use CyanogenMod, "Privacy Guard" must be disabled for the PeopleSync App. Otherwise, the app is not allowed to access and synchronize your contacts and events.
Failed to authorize: Please check username, password and server name.
